name: Mamaro
description:
*Requires Xbox Controller*

The Game is set in a dystopian setting, where players take control of Mamaro, a giant robot who has to protect Lucy as they travel through the game. The game focuses on elements of trust using visual and audio prompts as a basis for the games mechanics and theme.
